product_name: Camaro Rashguard Shorts - Toddler Boys' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: If your toddler spends so much time at the pool or beach he'd rather trade his feet for fins, help him stay sunburn-free and comfortable in the sun-protective Camaro Rashguard shorts. Integrated UPF 50+ sun protection protects skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Stretch nylon fabric feels soft against skin and dries quickly. Closeout.
short_description: If your toddler spends so much time at the pool or beach he'd rather trade his feet for fins, help him stay sunburn-free and comfortable in the sun-protective Camaro Rashguard shorts.
